name: OCSI
label: Orthologous Causal Structure Identification (OCSI)
shortDescription: An enhancement of CSI, network inference for time course datasets across different species. Requires input from the CSI app, ran for each of the datasets separately.
longDescription: An enhancement of CSI, network inference for time course datasets across different species. Requires input from the CSI app, ran for each of the datasets separately.
author: Alice Minotto

details.label: CSI input
details.description: csi_out.csv as produced by all the individual species' CSI runs.

details.label: Orthologue file
details.description: Orthologue file, with an orthologue group occupying a single comma-delimited line in the file. Each gene ID across all the species in the analysis needs to appear in this file.

details.label: OCSI framework
details.description: Choose between an hypernetwork-constrained or pairwise-comparison-across-all-pairs-of-species mode of operations. The former is recommended for 4+ species, the latter for 3 or 2.

details.label: Temperature
details.description: The influence on network similarity on updating the topology ( the higher the temperature, the higher the network similarity's impact). Default should be about 10 for framework 1and around 2-3 for framework 2.

details.label: Parental Set Depth
details.description: As provided to CSI for the runs that are used on input here.

details.label: Gibbs Chain Length
details.description: How many Gibbs sampling iterations to perform.

details.label: Burn-in
details.description: How many initial Gibbs updates to discard as burn-in.

details.label: Weifeiler-Lehman Depth
details.description: Network kernel depth. An increase amplifies the difference between networks at the cost of computational run time. Values above 2 not recommended.
